capability.name: Sales Planning
capability.definition: Plan, and assess sales activity and re-direct resources and priorities as necessary
capability.role: Plan, and assess sales activity and re-direct resources and priorities as necessary
capability.example: Sales management review quarterly performance and pipeline and set sales targets and allocations for the upcoming cycle

key_features.name: Plan sales activity
key_features.description: Enables plan sales activity to support plan, and assess sales activity and re-direct resources and priorities as necessary

key_features.name: Assess sales performance
key_features.description: Enables assess sales performance to support plan, and assess sales activity and re-direct resources and priorities as necessary

key_features.name: Re-direct resources as necessary
key_features.description: Enables re-direct resources as necessary to support plan, and assess sales activity and re-direct resources and priorities as necessary

key_features.name: Set priorities for sales activities
key_features.description: Enables set priorities for sales activities to support plan, and assess sales activity and re-direct resources and priorities as necessary
